csw:Record.dc:title: Baltic Sea - Diurnal Subskin Sea Surface Temperature Analysis
csw:Record.dct:abstract:
'''Short description:''' For the Baltic Sea - the DMI Sea Surface Temperature Diurnal Subskin L4 aims at providing hourly analysis of the diurnal subskin signal at 0.02deg. x 0.02deg. horizontal resolution, using the BAL L4 NRT product as foundation temperature and satellite data from infra-red radiometers. Uses SST satellite products from the sensors: Metop B AVHRR, Sentinel-3 A/B SLSTR, VIIRS SUOMI NPP & NOAA20
'''DOI (product) :''' https://doi.org/10.48670/moi-00309
